import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; function ComparePage() { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch("http://localhost:5000/api/admin") .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => setProducts(Array.isArray(data) ? data : [])) .catch((err) => console.error("❌ Грешка при зареждане на продукти:", err) ); }, []); return (
← Home

Antivirus Comparison

Compare features, pricing, and performance to find the right antivirus solution for your needs.

{products.map((product) => ( ))}
Antivirus Rating Price/Year Malware Protection Performance Platforms
{product.ProductName || "Unknown"} {product.AverageRating ? `${product.AverageRating.toFixed(1)} / 5.0` : "–"} {product.Price} Excellent Medium
{["Windows", "macOS", "iOS", "Android"].map((os) => ( {os} ))}
); } export default ComparePage;
